'''Regisvines''' are a [[Normal Boss]] group. They are [[Whopperflowers]] that have fed for a long time without interruption, their elemental properties are more refined but they lose the mobility their brethren had.

In combat, Regisvines start with an elemental [[Shield/Enemy|shield]] located at their roots or their corolla that significantly increases their [[RES]]. If the shield is destroyed with the appropriate [[Elemental Reaction]]s, the Regisvine will become paralyzed and lose their increased RES.

==Types==
{{Enemies by Category List|Regisvines|header=1}}

==Trivia==
*The term ''regisvine'' is most likely a portmanteau made of {{wt|regis#Latin|'''''regis'''''}}, genitive singular form of {{wt|rex#Latin|''rex''}}, and '''vine'''. Hence, Regisvine meaning king's vine.
